title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Propellant Sloshing Control Design for Space Launch Vehicles

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physics and control theory understanding, with familiarity in machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Cultivating the ability to design control policies considering stability and safety by utilizing simulation tools that simulate actual projectile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can describe the procedure for designing control policies reflecting CLF/CBF conditions within a reinforcement learning framework.
Learners can apply DRL algorithms to solve propellant sloshing control problems in a simulated environment.
Learners can assess and improve the robustness of control systems using Monte Carlo techniques.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
